Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting

Class BasicAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting.BasicAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicAccount, java.io.Serializable

    public class BasicAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IBasicAccount
    Trading account which is supporting to record stock trading orders and orders to transfer money in and out of the account;
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setAccountCloseDate​(java.util.Date endDate)
